item.description:
OK... I am going to try and be a month ahead for all meetups, so you can plan accordingly. I know this is around the holidays, so if you can't make it, we'll miss you!

Based on the feedback from the polls, the restaurant I chose for December is Rasoi. See info about the restaurant and menu here Rasoi restaurant. I figured this would be a little lighter for around the holidays, a little less expensive and hopefully will satisfy the Indian food lovers as well as vegetarians.

I was able to reserve a setup for 18 with individual bills. If the event fills up, please respond as "no" and state that you would like to be put on the wait list. If there are any cancelations, I will contact people in order of RSVP.

Based on the tremendous respose for this meetup, I will only be collecting the $1.00 for meetup fees every other meetup. If you don't think this is fair, please let me know and I will see about another solution.

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Rhode Island Dining December meetup- RASOI's
